title: 9 rp please?
body: Im at 966 rp right now and im really wanting to get one of the new lunar revel skins coming out. If there is something i can do to get this 9 rp please can a riot employee tell me!! :(

replies.body:
If you haven't received a freebie before, you can write to us through a [Player Support Request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). It could take a little bit of time to get to your request since it's a little less critical than other issues we resolve day-to-day, but we will gladly take a look at your situation to see if we can help. 

Oh, and be ready to do something silly in exchange. :)
fakkkk if i knew this  i wouldnt have bought pickpocket twitch :c 4 off from vandal

I am willing to do whatever it takes senpai. I sent a message to riot support hoping to get the new ahri skin before it goes away! I can't make up my mind on which skin I want. You guys make too many good skins.
